products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. A light filtering fabric ensures complete privacy without completly blocking out the light. A stunning ivory shade, this blind is great way to add depth and interest to your window dressing. products.title: Amor Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: The amor pearl roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, kitchens and living rooms. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Almond - Roller Blind
products.description: Include the sophisticated roma (fr) in almond within your home or commercial surrounding as an elegant addition with beneficial, practical elements. The modern rolling mechanism with its simple pull-cord creates a contemporary look, and the blind is formed with flame-retardant fabric to suit any surrounding. Forge a soothing and serene space by hanging the almond with a blend of neutral and wholesome tones, such as biscuit, ivory, and mocha.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out. Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect.

products.title: Crystalline Voile Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Cream focuses on celebrating the interplay between ambient light and finely woven fabric. The subtle variations in thickness and spacing of the mesh give the fabric a life of its own that provides an extra layer of depth for your eye to explore. Use cream where you want to break up a simple monotone surface by adding a little bit of texture that won't come to the fore in the same way that an eye-catching floral pattern would.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Mix practicality with style by featuring the quality origin (blackout) in oyster grey within your home. Being a quality blackout blind, this blind can help you and your family to get the best night's sleep possible by blocking out the night-time light and summertime sun. Complement the delectable oyster grey with a harmonising combination of coffee and cream tones to produce a warm and welcoming room full of soothing colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Magnolia - Roller Blind
products.description: Pale and neutral, the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings out the best in all colours, and sits on a soft, smooth fabric. As well as being fine and malleable, this blind is a powerful blackout fabric that is durable and will last year upon year. The magnolia will complement almost any shade, and can be used as a central feature in a brown or neutral colour scheme in a bedroom or living room. Or instead, set it amongst greens or blues for a refreshing, calming look in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Spun Pearl - Roller Blind
products.description: The elegant neutrality of the origin (blackout)'s spun pearl brings warmth and sophistication wherever it's used. This taupe coloured blind is made from sturdy, high quality fabric that offers the latest in blackout technology, making it the perfect choice for keeping out harmful uv rays. The spun pearl will add style and grace to a cream and gold dcor scheme in a classic yet contemporary living room or bedroom.

products.title: Deanna Soft Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a gentle, off-white cream to provide a calming, discreet background colour, but want a little bit of character to go with it, then the softly patterned deanna in soft cream is the blind for you. Ideal for a hallway in which you want to control the light without darkening the room or clashing with your existing interior dcor, this blind will work well against browns and other neutrals.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, opaque cream of the origin (blackout) in oyster gives you the best of both worlds; all of the benefits of a high quality blackout blind, while still maintaining a light, window-like feel. The smooth, hardy fabric means it's also built to last, not just for show. Cream, of course, will match almost any colour scheme, but will look particularly good in a traditionally styled neutral living room, surrounded by browns and golds, or pitted against bolder colours in a bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Kerry Pearl River Roller Blind
products.description: This elegant pastel blind features a raincloud-grey tone with delicate silver undertones, for a feather-soft shade that lends itself to near enough any colour scheme. Created with 100% blackout fabric, it's an ideal choice for bedrooms and movie rooms, where the dense fabric ensures minimal light bleed in from outside. River pearl is of their bestselling rollers, and also available as a vertical.

products.title: Gibson Egg Shell Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson egg shell is a light, bright fabric. Use this to help lighten a room and help to make it feel bigger. The light colour will pair with any decor and this blind is suitable for any room in the home - especially bathrooms. The 100% pvc fabric is fully waterproof, meaning that it can be installed right next to a shower without worry about damaging the fabric. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Ritz Luxury Cream Roller Blind
products.description: This blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Lux Dark Cream Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms and living rooms where you need to block all of the light - like when trying to sleep or when there is glare on your tv.

products.title: Lux Dark Butterscotch Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms and living rooms where you need to block all of the light - like when trying to sleep or when there is glare on your tv.

products.title: Belmont Cream Roller Blind
products.description: The belmont cream roller blind will add style to your window with its textured stripes. This gorgeous neutral colour can be paired in many different ways and will really bring your interior together. The light cream is a beautiful addition to any home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Veil Cream Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil cream voile blind has a destinctive stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Pura Ivory Voile Roller Blind
products.description: Thepura ivory voile is a soft cream colour with a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Magnolia Blackout Inky Roller Blind
products.description: Magnolia blackout is a beautiful floral patterned fabric available in two lovely colours. This bold white and grey roller blind is perfect to add a floral touch to any room in your home. The neutral colours in the pattern also mean this blind will go with a lot of decors.
